overview:
After completing a PhD in Microbiology, Alex spent 3 years in the City of London as a stockbroker before moving into a series of commercial roles in Biotech companies. Initially he worked for a university spin-out developing novel systems to decontaminate complex effluents. After this he ran the European subsidiary of a US diagnostics company setting up distribution networks into the food, water and environmental industries.

Prior to joining NorthStar Equity Investors, Alex was European Sales Director for a Bioinformatics company.

Contact: alex.buchan@northstarei.com
